simulator_blurb: X-axis rolls left and right. Best for flight sim fans
you_can_change_your_mind:
You can change your mind later.
Enable or disable 'Arcade Controls'
in the Options -> Controls menu
tutorial_move:
Steer the aircraft in all directions.
Roll to the left and right,
and pitch up and down
tutorial_throttle:
Speed up and slow down the aircraft.
Go to maximum and minimum throttle.

Turning is slower at high speed,
but faster at low speed.
tutorial_look:
Situational awareness is key,
take a look around.
tutorial_shoot:
Shoot down the target drone.
Fly into range (500 or less) and wait for a lock-on
When locked, fire your missiles!
tutorial_target:
You will often engage several hostiles at once.
Target the second enemy aero.
tutorial_focus:
It's easier to pursue a target
if you track it.
Toggle tracking on and off.
tutorial_special:
Your aero can equip a special ability
You currently have countermeasure flares
that distract enemy missiles
Fire a flare now.
tutorial_weapon:
Your aero is armed with multiple weapons.
Hold the button to show the weapon selector
Choose 'RKT' with the mouse or stick
Then release
tutorial_command:
Each island has a primary target
Destroying it is your main objective!
Find and destroy the one on this island.
tutorial_end:
Land at the carrier after destroying
the objective to proceed to the next island.
You can also land to repair and rearm.
